thread.title: Mitchell Claire
thread.title_full: Tax Tiger reviewed by Mitchell Claire

author: Mitchell Claire
title: Mitchell Claire
text: I decided to reach out to Tax tiger for help. I was contacted by the IRS, who was ready to lien on my possessions as well as a wage levy,for 180 thousand dollar tax liability,. The excellent staff with the Tax attorney at the helm was able to, after tedious negotiations, decrease my liability with an offer and compromise to 986 dollars. Unbelievable! Highly recommend this most professional, hard working company
